message: If you are heading to Portland and want to save a little, you could always buddy up in a hotel room OR buddy up with a local. Here is your place to do that!
I'm probably going to end up couch surfing, any locals attending that might want to host me?
Braver man than I. I'm down for sharing a room. Going to be there for both conferences.
Looking for a place to crash for two as well - will code/promote/advise in return.
this reminds me that I really need to find a room for that week.
